title: The command '/bin/sh -c' returned a non-zero code: 2 during docker image
body_html:
I try to do the following commands according to https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch

docker build . -t pytorch-cudnnv5
docker build . -t pytorch-cudnnv6 -f tools/docker/Dockerfile-v6
nvidia-docker run --rm -ti --ipc=host pytorch-cudnnv5

But I got a error when I typed in the first comman.

Here's the log.

body:
I try to do the following commands according to https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch

docker build . -t pytorch-cudnnv5 
docker build . -t pytorch-cudnnv6 -f tools/docker/Dockerfile-v6
nvidia-docker run --rm -ti --ipc=host pytorch-cudnnv5
